criteria: All linting rules pass; All unit tests pass; Code coverage >80%.
success_metrics: Green builds on all pull requests.

criteria: SAST and SCA scans find zero 'High' or 'Critical' vulnerabilities. All Sprint 1 gates pass.
bypass_criteria: No bypass allowed for security failures.
success_metrics: All PRs merged to main are free of known high-severity vulnerabilities.

criteria: All integration and E2E tests pass against the deployed staging environment. Post-deployment health checks are successful.
bypass_criteria: Allowed for non-critical bug fixes with manual verification.
success_metrics: Staging environment is stable and mirrors production readiness.
